text: He muminasakala! Tomaloke cayatanara padanka anusarana nakaraiba. Yiye cayatanara padanka anusarana karae niscaya cayatane aslilata arau beya karmarahe nirdesa diye. Allahara anugraha arau daya nathakile tomalokara kone'o ketiya'o paraitra haâ€™ba noraarailahemtena, kintu allahe yaka iccha paraitra karae, arau allaha sarbasraota sarbajna
